availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, tinner. Pennsylvania native. Married to E. E. McGill. Father of William McGill and John McGill. Married to Martha Cambrow on June 21, 1853. Father of Charles C. McGill and Stephen McGill. Married to Theresa H. Griffin on August 9, 1860. Father of Theresa McGill and Benjamin McGill. Tinner in Nelson County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 281B-281A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 187.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, Bardstown, p. 78B.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Film # 000482709, Jefferson County, August 9, 1860 (accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Film #000241382, Washington County, June 21, 1853.
Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1965, Film # 7020614, Washington County, State File # 31645, December 3, 1939.
